name: The room (itch) (fridays1881)
description:
The room is a game I made in alliance with a personal game jam idea I had(80's style game) the game is very basic and only took one day to build but I think there's still some fun to be had, each round the skeleton gets stronger but so do you, you either get a slight damage buff or health increase.

Movement - Wasd

Combat progression - Space bar

Enjoy :)

-Project made by Ethan / fridays18
